meanings.sent1: The drone flew pilotless through the sky.
meanings.sent2: The pilotless plane landed smoothly on the runway.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see the pilotless balloon floating above the city.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a pilotless spaceship exploring distant galaxies is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The pilotless vehicle moved with precision and grace.

meanings.sent1: The pilotless car navigated the streets autonomously.
meanings.sent2: The team developed a pilotless system for the submarine.
meanings.sent3: The pilotless lawnmower seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: In the future, pilotless technology will revolutionize transportation.
meanings.sent5: The pilotless robot completed its tasks efficiently.

meanings.definition: Describing a vehicle or aircraft that does not require a pilot to operate.
meanings.sent1: The pilotless helicopter hovered steadily in the air.
meanings.sent2: The company unveiled their latest pilotless aircraft model.
meanings.sent3: The pilotless drone delivered packages to customers' doorsteps.
meanings.sent4: The military tested a new pilotless tank in the field.
meanings.sent5: Pilotless technology is advancing rapidly in the aviation industry.
